case_title: ALLEGATIONS OF CONFLICT OF INTEREST AND ABUSE OF AUTHORITY BY SENIOR OFFICIAL 1, UNMIL

introduction: The Investigations Division of the Office of Internal Oversight Services (ID/OIOS) received information that a Senior Official for the United Nations Mission in Liberia (SRSG UNMIL) was involved in business dealings with a businessman operating in Liberia, and had abused his authority UNMIL to the benefit of either himself or of the businessman.
investigation_details: The evidence adduced by the investigation does not support the allegations. The ID/OIOS investigation found no evidence that the Senior Official was involved in business dealings with the businessman, nor that he had abused his authority to the benefit of either himself or of the businessman.
